price: Şüphesiz bu anlatılanlar gerçek olan kıssalardır. Allah’tan başka (ibadete layık hak) ilah yoktur. Allah, elbette Aziz'dir, Hakim'dir.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلۡقَصَصُ ٱلۡحَقُّۚ وَمَا مِنۡ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā lahuwa al-qaṣaṣu al-ḥaqu wamā min ilāhin illā al-lahu wa-inna al-laha lahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
